title: Tooltips
behaviorsList: An alternative version for segments that does not require dependencies; it works like switches in a stacked version.
A maximum of 6 items can be used.
Can be used with icons, without icons, or with only icons that need to have tooltips.
Do not use long labels; they can only go to a second line. Longer labels will be truncated with dots.
Only supports primary colors or system colors.
Can select multiple items, similar to switches.
